name: Bounties and Booty
description:
Bounties and Booty

Manage your crew members, smite your enemies, and relish in victory on the open sea!

Controls:

  • Move by right-clicking
  • Open the crew manager with tab
    • Assign crew members to certain positions by clicking the icons to the right of the crew members' names
  • Left-click to the Port or Starboard side of your ship (after assigning a crew member to your cannons) to shoot
  • Stop with spacebar
  • Number keys 1, 2, and 3 to change speeds
  • R to restart

Win by killing all remaining enemies on the map.

Lose by letting all your crew members die
